Tom Emerson wrote:

> I have a couple of large crawls that I want to start, but will hold
> off for 1.2 to be labeled before doing them if we're close. How close
> is HEAD to what will ship in 1.2?

Its looking like Monday or Tuesday.  We've run our base test plan and 
all seems fine and dandy but a shadow 1.2 crawl of a 1.0.5 crawl -- the 
HEAD of the of heritrix_1_0 branch -- has turned up data that needs to 
looked at more closely.  Will update the list if it isn't going to be 
out by Tuesday.
St.Ack
